biotools.summary: PnGT stand for 'Physicochemical n-Grams Tool'. It is a tool for protein physicochemical descriptor generation . Physicochemical n-Grams Tool (PnGT) is an open source standalone software for calculating physicochemical descriptors of protein developed using the Python scripting language.

bioschemas.name: PnGT
